item.title: 'Seed Music'
item.description: Birds / Surfers Earlier this month, one of my favorite guitarists, Plini, made an Instagram post describing how a photograph of surfers out on the seas resembled notes on a staff, inspiring him to create a short piece of music. You can view the post and listen to an excerpt of his song “Surfers” here. Plini followed the same melody-generating process using an image of a flock of birds which is equally awesome.
